# Arpeggio: add2 in C# (Shape: G)

## Brief Presentation:
This arpeggio is an Add2 arpeggio in the key of C# played in the G shape. It consists of the root note (C#), the major second (D#), the perfect fifth (G#), and the octave (C#). The major second (D#) is the added note in this arpeggio, giving it a unique sound.

## Notes and Intervals:
- Root (C#)
- Major 2nd (D#)
- Perfect 5th (G#)
- Octave (C#)

## Genre and Musical Flavor:
This arpeggio has a dreamy and ethereal sound due to the addition of the major second (D#). It can be used in various genres like jazz, fusion, pop, and progressive rock to add color and interest to chord progressions and solos. The Add2 arpeggio in C# (G shape) adds a touch of sophistication and tension to the music, making it stand out in compositions.
